com.jasonwjones.pbcs

Interface PbcsClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InteropClient, PbcsPlanningClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PbcsClientImpl

    public interface PbcsClient
extends PbcsPlanningClient, InteropClient
    The PbcsClient interface is the main interface that programs using this API should use. It provides a unified facade over what are essentially two REST APIs that make up PBCS: A Planning API and an LCM ("Interop") API.
    Author:
    Jason Jones

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.jasonwjones.pbcs.interop.InteropClient

        EXTERNAL, LCM

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.jasonwjones.pbcs.client.PbcsPlanningClient

        getApi, getApplication, getApplications, getServer

      • Methods inherited from interface com.jasonwjones.pbcs.interop.InteropClient

        deleteFile, downloadFile, downloadFile, downloadFileViaStream, downloadFileViaStream, getSnapshotDetails, LcmExport, LcmImport, listFiles, uploadFile
